description:
* Based on visual novel developed by http://anidb.net/cr1046 [Key].
The story of Little Busters! revolves around the main protagonist http://anidb.net/ch47375 [Naoe Riki], a young male high school student. When Riki was a child, his parents died, leaving him hopeless and depressed. He was saved by a group of three young boys and one girl his age, who referred to themselves as the Little Busters, a group dedicated to fighting evil and preserving justice.
The leader of the group was http://anidb.net/ch43220 [Natsume Kyousuke], who had a younger sister named http://anidb.net/ch43219 [Rin]. The other two members were http://anidb.net/ch43221 [Inohara Masato] and http://anidb.net/ch43222 [Miyazawa Kengo], who were rivals despite being friends. They took Riki out and played together with him during his time of need, making him the fifth Little Busters member. In time, Riki enjoyed playing with them, and his grief over his parents gradually faded away. Now, Riki and his friends are in their second year of high school, except for Kyousuke who is in his third year. They still hang out together, and enjoy their school life.
Source: Wiki

REGULAR.description:
The leader of the "Little Busters," Kyousuke, returns to school after a job hunting break and calls the old gang together. He suggests that they all do something that they can only do now, while they`re young - and that something is playing baseball.  Now all Kyousuke, Riki, Masato, Kengo, and Rin need to do is find enough new members to make a complete baseball team...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Team Name Will Be... the Little Busters
チーム名は... リトルバスターズだ

REGULAR.description:
Riki meets the cheerful, easygoing Komari on a visit to the school rooftop, and decides to invite her to join the Little Busters. Meanwhile, one of the cats Rin is taking care of strolls along with a mysterious note tied to its tail...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi ga Shiawase ni Naru to, Watashi mo Shiawase
Si tu es heureux, je le suis aussi
君が幸せになると, 私も幸せ

REGULAR.description:
Riki is called out for tea and a chat by Kurugaya Yuiko, a mysterious girl who rarely shows up to class. He invites her to join the Little Busters, but when she meets the team`s resident musclebrain, Masato, sparks instantly fly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Like Cute Things, You See
J’aime tout ce qui est mignon
Kawaii Mono wa Suki Da yo, Watashi wa
可愛いものは好きだよ, 私は

REGULAR.description:
On the school roof, Riki catches Komari whispering something about an older brother in her sleep. But when she wakes up, she tells him that she`s an only child and her brother only appears to her in dreams, where he reads her a sad story from a picture book only to fade away when she awakens...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nous allons en faire un endroit joyeux et rayonnant
Shiawase no Hidamari o Tsukuru no Desu
We`ll Make a Happy, Sunny Place
幸せのひだまりを作るのです

REGULAR.description:
When Komari`s normally cheerful smiles begin to look sad and lonely, Riki decides to cheer her up by searching for her older brother... but does he really exist? The next day, the two of them pay a visit to Komari`s hometown in hopes of recovering her lost memories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: À la recherche des choses perdues

REGULAR.description:
Komari has finally recovered her memories of her older brother - and it has left her in a tragic state of confusion. With the support of the Little Busters, Riki sets out to bring Komari`s cheerful smile back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: À la recherche de choses merveilleuses
みつけよう すてきなこと

REGULAR.description:
The Little Busters are still short a few members, so Riki decides to invite a girl from a neighboring class, Saigusa Haruka, to the team. But the energetic, playful Haruka has a reputation for being the school`s biggest troublemaker, and is under constant pursuit by the school`s Disciplinary Committee.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さて, わたしは誰でしょう?

REGULAR.description:
When Riki sees Kud playing Frisbee with her dogs, he knows that her quick, agile movements would make her a good candidate for the Little Busters and extends the invitation. But Kud hasn`t had an easy time making friends since she came to Japan, and she could use the help of her new teammates to find a willing dorm roommate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s, Looking for Roommate na no Desu
れっつ, るっきんぐふぉーるーむめいとなのです

REGULAR.description:
One of Rin`s cats brings her yet another mysterious note. This time its cryptic demand is to "save the school cafeteria" - but none of the Little Busters can see what about the cafeteria needs saving.
Source: crunchyroll

While searching for a stray ball sent flying at a Little Busters practice, Riki encounters Mio, a girl who always sits and reads in the shade of a tree with a parasol open. There`s one book she`s particularly fond of, but she won`t tell Riki what it`s about. When she loses the book, it`s up to Riki to help her find it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le ciel d’azur, les océans turquoise
Sora no Ao Umi no Ao
The Blue of the Sky, the Blue of the Sea

REGULAR.description:
Kyousuke gathers the Little Busters together for a little test of courage. Their mission takes them on a search through the school building while avoiding traps set by Kyousuke, but eventually they sense that an eerie black shadow has been watching their progress...
Source: crunchyroll

Riki has invited Mio to be the manager of the Little Busters, and the team welcomes her warmly. However, just when they think she`s finally opening up to them, she disappears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Blue World, Stretching on to Eternity
Mugen ni Tsuzuku Aoi Sora o
Un monde bleu qui s`étend à l`infini

REGULAR.description:
Mio has been absent from school for several days, and everyone, even the Little Busters, seems to be gradually forgetting about her. Riki finally spots her in the courtyard again, but he notices an unfamiliar loneliness in her eyes...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: À l’endroit où commence la fin
終わりの始まる場所へ

REGULAR.description:
When was the last time anyone saw Mio reading a book under the tree in the courtyard?  What kind of person was she?  Riki`s memories become vague and he becomes scared that he might forget her completely.  Will he be able to find the real Mio before she completely disappears?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C’est pourquoi je te tends la main
Dakara Boku wa Kimi ni Te o Nobasu
That`s Why I`ll Hold My Hand Out to You
だからぼくは君に手をのばす

REGULAR.description:
Rin has called Riki to her room under false pretenses.  Now he is stuck for the night while his friends mount a rescue attempt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ムヒョッス, 最高だぜ

REGULAR.description:
Saigusa Haruka is considered the biggest rule violator at school and the school Disciplinary Committee has it out for her, in particular Futaki Kanata. When Haruka’s family history is posted over the school the Little Busters must search for her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Look at Me Like That
Ne me regardez pas comme ça

REGULAR.description:
The secret of the Saigusa family is explained to the Little Buster crew, and Riki wants to help his friend cope with her new Infamy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dareka ni Soba ni Ite Hoshikattanda
I Wanted Someone to Stay by My Side
Je voulais quelqu’un à mes côtés
誰かにそばにいて欲しかったんだ

REGULAR.description:
With the encouragement of her friends, Haruka confronts Futaki and lays it all out.  What 
Futaki has to share will change how the Little Busters view her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kotae wa Kokoro no Naka ni Arunda
La réponse est dans ton cœur
The Answer Is Within Your Heart
答えは心のなかにあるんだ

REGULAR.description:
Kud might be smart be she lacks some common sense concepts due to her traveling.  With the upcoming practical exams the Little Busters aim to help her ace the test.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je vais faire de mon mieux
きっと, ずっと, がんばるのです

REGULAR.description:
Sasasegawa Sasam and Rin continue to have battles, but that is pushed aside for as another one of her cats have brought her a mysterious message to help another student.
Source: crunchyroll

Kud shares an ancient island custom with Riki as she remembers the time she spent with her mother.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fifty Nautical Miles into the Sky

REGULAR.description:
The Little Busters are there to help, but sometimes they are powerless to do anything.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je reviendrai, je vous le promets
わたし, 必ず戻ってきます

REGULAR.description:
Tebwa rebel forces are angry at the government and are looking for anyone connected 
with the space program to blame…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anata no Taisetsu na Mono no Tame ni
Toutes les choses qui comptent pour toi
あなたの大切なもののために

REGULAR.description:
Rin next challenge has been delivered and Riki has grown more suspicious of the timing of the notes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If Rin-chan Is Happy, I`m Happy, Too
Rin-chan ga Shiawase Nara Watashi mo Shiawase Dakara
Si tu es heureuse, Rin, alors je le serai aussi
鈴ちゃんが幸せならわたしも幸せだから

REGULAR.description:
Kyousuke predictions of the final Little Buster member shocks Riki, but that is not the 
bombshell that will be presented to Riki.
Source: crunchyroll

Thrust into the role of leader of the Little Busters, Riki is finding it hard to fill Kyousuke shoes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Will Protect the World of Saitou!
Sekai no Saitou wa Ore ga Mamoru!
世界の斎藤は俺が守る!
BD & DVD whole volume purchase special notice CM 15s
ลิตเติ้ล บัสเตอร์ส!
